body_html:
From the error message NotFoundError (see above for traceback): checkpoint/model.ckpt-1_temp_5d8d532077d241a38f2d79ac2ffeb9a7; No such file or directory it seems that the workers are having trouble writing to the checkpoint directory.

It is possible that the parent directory where checkpoints are to be written is either not accessible or is being removed while the training is in process?
body_text:
From the error message NotFoundError (see above for traceback): checkpoint/model.ckpt-1_temp_5d8d532077d241a38f2d79ac2ffeb9a7; No such file or directory it seems that the workers are having trouble writing to the checkpoint directory.
It is possible that the parent directory where checkpoints are to be written is either not accessible or is being removed while the training is in process?
body:
From the error message `NotFoundError (see above for traceback): checkpoint/model.ckpt-1_temp_5d8d532077d241a38f2d79ac2ffeb9a7; No such file or directory` it seems that the workers are having trouble writing to the `checkpoint` directory.

It is possible that the parent directory where checkpoints are to be written is either not accessible or is being removed while the training is in process?
